title: Tiny Furniture: Post-Grad Returns Home to Find Herself
summary: A film school graduate moves back home to navigate post-college life in New York
content: 2010 comedy-romance film, 1h 39m runtime, directed by Lena Dunham, 6.2/10 IMDb rating, 80% on Rotten Tomatoes, follows recent graduate Aura returning to live at home, described as amusing and offbeat
